===Syntax===

*%5Bsub%5D* - It means where injection substring.

Example: id=' or 1=[[sub]]--

*[[cmd]]* - Variable for command execution if your user rights *sysadmin*

Example: id=' or 1=[[sub]];[[cmd]]-- ([[cmd]] cannot be used without [[sub]])

If injection in cookies just put [[sub]] or [[cmd]] into cookie string and replace spaces to plusses.

Example: session_id=12345'+or+1=[[sub]]--
